EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Strata!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for visiting Pivotal at Strata + Hadoop World <http://pivotal.io/event/strata-ny-2015> in New York. We hope you enjoyed learning about the evolving practices and technologies for innovating and transforming business through software.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Recently, Pivotal announced the contribution of its Pivotal HAWQ Hadoop-native advanced SQL analytics database and MADlib parallel machine learning library to the Apache Software Foundation. Additional details are included in this press release <https://pivotal.io/big-data/press-release/pivotal-open-sources-top-analytics-engine> and blog <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news/the-way-to-hadoop-native-sql>. - The Pivotal session <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ny-2015/public/schedule/detail/45881> at the event provided a unique look at new developments in the rapidly-changing world of the Internet of Things (IoT) and data science. The presentation slides are available here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/business-impact-from-iot-just-add-data-science>. - Daniel Baskette <https://youtu.be/WKE04GRoO3U> spoke with theCUBE <https://youtu.be/WKE04GRoO3U> about the ways that Pivotal is helping customers on their transformational journeys. - Pivotal helped educate attendees about the ODPi <http://odpi.org/>. Check out this panel discussion <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V2LFTZqrUJw> and the blog <http://blog.odpi.org/> for more information about the widespread support for the ODPi and the initiative’s advancement of big data projects.
Want more?
- Check out these new resources about:
- Hadoop Native SQL <http://pivotal.io/hadoop-native-sql> - Apache HAWQ <http://hawq.incubator.apache.org/> - MADlib <http://madlib.incubator.apache.org/>
- Pivotal HDB
- Join us on October 13th for the Data Science Driven Approaches to Malware Detection <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1050245/4829B37368BD3529DC6C2AD4A62B9F3B?partnerref=Pivotal> webinar. - Explore the Pivotal Podcast Series <http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal>, which includes interviews and discussions about how organizations can be more open, agile and cloud-ready.
We look forward to seeing you at the next Pivotal event <https://pivotal.io/news-events>!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
